faq4.q: Why is the KYC verification so  complicated?
faq4.a:
We understand that the KYC verification process can sometimes feel slow or confusing, and we appreciate your patience!

To ensure the safety and legitimacy of all donations and votes, Socious partners with Veriff, a trusted third-party identity verification provider. While most verifications are completed quickly, delays can occur due to:
- Incomplete or blurry document uploads
- Mismatch between your ID and selfie
- High traffic during peak hours
- Network issues or app version conflicts

To avoid delays, make sure to:
- Use the latest version of the Socious Wallet app.
- Have a clear photo ID ready (passport, national ID, or driver's license).
- Take your selfie in good lighting, without filters or glasses.
- Follow the instructions on the Credentials page and select "Verify now" using Veriff.
- After successful verification, your dashboard banner will turn green â€” and youâ€™re ready to support projects! ðŸŽ‰

If you're still stuck, feel free to contact support via Info@socious.io
